Definition: In this task, you will be presented with a question in Persian. Based on the knowledge you need to answer the question, classify the question into "math_and_logic", "literature", or "common_knowledge".

Positive Examples.input: عدد 30 را بر نیم تقسیم می کنیم و سپس عدد 10 را به آن اضافه می کنیم. نتیجه کدام گزینه است؟
Positive Examples.explanation: This is a good example. You need mathematical knowledge to answer this question.

Positive Examples.explanation: You need encyclopedic knowledge to answer this question. So, this question belongs to the "common_knowledge" category.
